references.paper_title: VBench: Comprehensive Benchmark Suite for Video Generative Models
references.reason: VBench is a comprehensive benchmark, thus it is an important reference for the task of video generation evaluation.

references.paper_title: MV-Bench: A Comprehensive Multi-Modal Video Understanding Benchmark
references.reason: MV-Bench is a comprehensive benchmark for video understanding, making it crucial for the task of video understanding evaluations.

references.paper_title: A Survey of Large Language Models
references.reason: Zhao's survey of large language models is a crucial reference due to the significant role of LLMs in video understanding and generation.

references.paper_title: Qwen2-VL: Enhancing Vision-Language Model's Perception of the World at Any Resolution
references.reason: Qwen2-VL is an important open-source vision-language model that sets the state of the art for many tasks evaluated in the current paper.

references.paper_title: LLava-Next: Improved Reasoning, OCR, and World Knowledge
references.reason: LLaVA-Next is an important vision-language model that the IPV-Bench framework intends to improve.
